cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2326, Veterans’ Cyber Risk Assessment Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 59 (Thursday, April 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MACE:
H.R. 2326.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H1707]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: Veterans’ Cyber Risk Awareness Act
